participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Responsible and family-oriented, with a passion for music and a healthy lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i just bought a house recently. i'm married with two kids. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i'm an economics major. i eat a raw diet.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and playful, with a love for adventure and creativity.
participant_2.background: i like to make time stop. i'm a little girl. i live in the cloud. i have superpowers.

content.text: Hey! Are you married with two kids? Because I am.
